content.title: Cafe' Amor
content.content1: Green tea is a delicious and healthy beverage that has been enjoyed for centuries. It is made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant, which are then dried, rolled, and steamed to create its unique flavor. Green tea contains powerful antioxidants called catechins which help protect against cell damage caused by free radicals in our bodies. Studies have shown that drinking green tea can improve your health in many ways including boosting metabolism and aiding weight loss efforts as well as providing protection against heart disease, diabetes and certain types of cancer. The flavor of green tea varies greatly depending on where it was grown or how it was processed but generally speaking it has a light grassy taste with subtle floral notes underneath. It can be brewed hot or cold depending on preference but both will provide you with all its amazing benefits! Many people enjoy adding honey or lemon juice to their cup for extra sweetness without added sugar calories while others like to mix different varieties together such as matcha powder for an even more intense experience!
